import React from "react"; import "./post.css"; import MoreVertIcon from "@material-ui/icons/MoreVert"; import {Users} from "../../dummyData"; const Post = ({post})=>{ return(
u.id===post.userId).[0].profilePicture} alt=""/> {Users.filter((u)=>u.id===post.userId).[0].username} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{post.like} people like it
{post.comment} comments
); } export default Post;
